Amazing DVD.  Not only was it musically appealing, it was also visually appealing.  They did an awesome job with this.  Thank you for sharing it.  I'm definitely going to pick this up the next time I'm out.

Thanks for helping us get a peek at this wonderful film, and BIG thanks going out to the seeders who have been giving up their bandwidth to help people like me download the file.

I definitely wanna buy this now.
VTS_01_6 doesn't seem to have any audio with it. Does anyone else have this problem?
i thought dvd's were 4.7 gb ? i know this is probably a codec thing, i'm just curious.

brianisbrilliant.
Nope. DVDs can be 4.7 Gbs and 8.5 Gbs (dual layer). This is a rip from a dual layer disc. As the concert/documentary was shot on HD, it makes sense to release it on a dual layer DVD, or even in the future on blue ray, the winning format in the brief HD DVD war. 
Excellent film, btw

1) Backup file 'VIDEO_TS.BUP' should be identical to 'VIDEO_TS.IFO'
2) Backup file 'VTS_01_0.BUP' should be identical to 'VTS_01_0.IFO'
3) DVD-Video files compliance test failed

Is it supposed to be like that?
